jcr:content.awardContent1: Secondary school students, ages 15-18, live with host families, attend local schools, and participate in community life in Germany.Â
jcr:content.awardReq1: A U.S. citizen, national or permanent resident Between the ages of 15 years and 18 years and 6 months at the start of the program A current high school student at the time of application, with a GPA of 3.0 or higher on a 4.0 scale
